alert.note: Alert for City and Borough of Juneau; Haines Borough and Klukwan (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 10 at 2:34PM AKST until February 11 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...MORE SNOW FOR PARTS OF THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE TONIGHT... Snow is expected again overnight Friday night. Petersburg has been dropped from the advisories as of this update due to temperatures expected to be too warm for significant snowfall. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Juneau Borough, Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highest accumulation for Juneau will be in the Mendenhall Valley and out the road. Juneau will likely see a change to rain early Saturday morning while Haines will stay snow throughout the event.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
